subject: Running
Olympic Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
Marathon Running
Heart
lead_paragraph: An autopsy was performed on Ryan Shay, who died during the United States Olympic trials for the marathon, but the results will not be final until perhaps the end of the week.
snippet: An autopsy was performed on Ryan Shay, who died during the United States Olympic trials for the marathon, but the results will not be final until perhaps the end of the week.
